This game is very fun, it's a horror movie simulation in a sense. You are put into an area and need to survive while completing tasks of fixing generators to escape. It also has a ton of lore on the survivors and killers!

100% get this if you are into the Spooky games.

Great game if you like this type of game that it-- its not for everyone. The patches are most the time lackluster.  Certain Killers remain strong while most others are trash. Intense game, with exciting moments, can be played stealth or skill based running. Survivor is fun if you don't bring a medkit. Bring a medkit win the game pretty much right now. They are very strong and need to be adjusted asap. The chases are great and a lot of times you running the killer to finally be hit once meant the killer spent a lot of time and resources (gens) to get that hit and the surv runs and heal in 8 seconds to full hp, and this can be done mid chase if played well enough. Either way I've followed this game for a long time and would recommend it to anyone, but I can't promise you'll like it.

突然发现玩了这么久杀鸡居然都没写任何测评。
黎明杀机，永远滴神！
虽然现在黎明杀机有诸多问题：匹配系统太扯，屠夫天天被抓壮丁，被红段车队教做人；平衡不到位，现在整成了黎明竞速；诸多bug，吞豆子吞血点；太废肝等等等
但是这个一点都不影响它是我心里最好的非对称对抗游戏，朴实农场主与四个偷电贼的故事永不落伍。吊打市面上其他非对称对抗游戏。而且越玩我越喜欢制作组的小心思，尤其是各种地图的设计理念，小彩蛋什么的，越玩越有趣。虽然每一局游戏的核心玩法就是偷电和逮偷电贼，但是这个游戏真正的核心就是与屠夫的千层博弈。所以即使玩了这么久，每轮遇到的屠夫和地图带来的随机性，总是能给我新鲜感。
而且在杀鸡这个游戏中遇到了很多可可爱爱，不嫌我菜的朋友♪(^∇^*)
我永远喜欢黎明杀机~
